about_the_game:
Game Play

Work as a team launching weapons, reading sensors, and repairing your ship. The Captain will pilot and manage operations. Crew will spend their time at stations reading sensors, flipping switches, adjusting knobs and repairing equipment. You must find the enemy using sensors and optics. Fog of War will develop as contacts are lost and ship management tasks become chaotic.

Assets
The Destroyer is first ship in Assets series. Our Submarine will be the second. The Submarine is in Beta and available to test for purchasers. Each new Asset will accompany game modes that interact with all previous Assets. An Asset will be published as separate DLC. You can play in games without owning all Assets.

Multiplayer
Game is released in a staged rollout of servers. Asia located players should wait for server near them. Will update when new servers are added. USA servers are running Training to learn Destroyer operations. You will be attacking ship and submarine targets and avoiding torpedoes. The Match servers offer Destroyer vs Destroyer games.

USA East – 6
Central Europe Germany – 3
Asia – None
South America - None

A Player can captain a ship alone but it will be challenging to keep up with all duties. We have Crew Bots to fill empty slots when servers are quite. To organize a crew, we have a Discord server for meeting players, voice, and chat during game.

Crew Members
Captain
Owner of the Ship. Has controls to decide who will be in the crew and which battle group to deploy. Unable to operate any specialized stations.

Crew
Able to operate any mechanically inclined station. Able to repair anything at a faster rate. Able to use all stations.
Able to operate all specialized equipment at 100% accuracy.

Pilot ( Currently in Beta testing )
Can fly any type of plane. Has no skills to operate any specialized station.

Game Modes
Harbor Defense - Defend all ships in your harbor while trying to sink oponents.
Harbor Escort - Escort a Very Important Ship (VIS) to opponents harbor.
Rugby - Drag a Rubber Duck to the opponents harbor.
Duck Pond - Drag as many Rubber Ducks as you can back to your harbor. Proposed based on feedback from Players.
Maxwell - Electromagnetic effects. Radar, Jammers, Cloaking, Philly Exp . Proposed based on feedback from Players.
